column5: Dave just said he will be giving his boat away again this year list live http://www.basstalklive.com/live.htm SBK
There goes another wack of cash and wieght put on.
I might just enter this year.....
It should go to a fisherman. maybe have a super fan contest, with questions about the last three years, winner gets the boat? I dislike seeing someone win that boat that doesn't fish or care for dave
I guess Subway buys him the boat and all the fixin's. It's their contest, not really Dave's. It would be nice though............
I never entered last year, I think I'll go to subway and get one this year...leaving my beloved mr sub
how do you enter? eat Subs?
That's the whole idea Mike... it's called a lost leader.. no different than those grocery store sales to get you in and hope you stay..
